member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier
member.summary: Implements the FileClassifer task. Use the FileClassifer element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see FileClassifier Task.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier.CLREmbeddedResource
member.summary: Gets or sets the output Item list for the CLR resources that will be saved in the main assembly.
member.returns: The output Item list for the CLR resources that will be saved in the main assembly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier.CLRResourceFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the CLR resource file list.
member.returns: The CLR resource file list.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier.CLRSatelliteEmbeddedResource
member.summary: Gets or sets the output Item list for the CLR resources that will be saved in the satellite assembly.
member.returns: The output Item list for the CLR resources that will be saved in the satellite assembly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier.Culture
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture of the build.
member.returns: The culture of the build or null if the build is non-localizable

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier.Execute
member.summary: Executes a task.
member.returns: true if the task executed successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier.MainEmbeddedFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets non-localizable resources that will be embedded into the Main assembly.
member.returns: Non-localizable resources that will be embedded into the Main assembly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier.OutputType
member.summary: Gets or sets the output type of the assembly.
member.returns: The output type of the assembly. Can be “exe” or “dll”.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier.SatelliteEmbeddedFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the localizable files that are embedded in the satellite assembly for the culture that is specified by the property.
member.returns: The localizable files that are embedded in the satellite assembly for the culture that is specified by the property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.FileClassifier.SourceFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of items that are to be classified.
member.returns: The list of items that are to be classified.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly
member.summary: Implements the GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly task. Use the GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly Task.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the short name of the assembly that is generated for a project and is also the name of the target assembly that is temporarily generated.
member.returns: The short name of the assembly that is generated for a project and is also the name of the target assembly that is temporarily generated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly.CompileTargetName
member.summary: Gets or sets the MS Build target name which is used to generate assembly from source code files.
member.returns: The MS Build target name which is used to generate assembly from source code files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly.CompileTypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the appropriate item name which can be accepted by managed compiler task.
member.returns: The appropriate item name which can be accepted by managed compiler task.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly.CurrentProject
member.summary: Gets or sets the full path of current project file.
member.returns: The full path of current project file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly.Execute
member.summary: Executes a task.
member.returns: true if the task executed successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly.GeneratedCodeFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of generated code files.
member.returns: A list of generated code files. This can have 0 items.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly.IntermediateOutputPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory that the temporary target assembly is generated to.
member.returns: The directory that the temporary target assembly is generated to.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly.MSBuildBinPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the MS Build binary path.
member.returns: The MS Build binary path.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.GenerateTemporaryTargetAssembly.ReferencePath
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of resolved reference assemblies.
member.returns: A list of resolved reference assemblies.

member.summary: Gets or sets the item name which is used to keep the Reference list in managed compiler task.
member.returns: The item name which is used to keep the Reference list in managed compiler task.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.AllGeneratedFiles

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to run the compilation in second application domain.
member.returns: true to run the compilation in second application domain; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the application definition XAML file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the short name of assembly that will be generated for this project.
member.returns: The short name of assembly which will be generated for this project.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.AssemblyPublicKeyToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the public key token of the assembly.
member.returns: The public key token of the assembly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the assembly.
member.returns: The version of the assembly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.ContentFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of loose content files.
member.returns: A list of loose content files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.DefineConstants
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the current value of DefineConstants is kept.
member.returns: Specifies whether the current value of DefineConstants is kept, which affects target assembly generation; if this parameter is changed, the public API in the target assembly may be changed and the compilation of XAML files that reference local types may be affected.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.Execute
member.summary: Executes a task.
member.returns: true if the task executed successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.ExtraBuildControlFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of files that control whether a rebuild is triggered when the task reruns; a rebuild is triggered if one of these files changes.
member.returns: A list of files that control whether a rebuild is triggered when the task reruns; a rebuild is triggered if one of these files changes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.GeneratedBamlFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the generated binary XAML (BAML) files.
member.returns: The generated binary XAML (BAML) files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.GeneratedCodeFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of generated managed code files.
member.returns: The list of generated managed code files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.GeneratedLocalizationFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the generated localization file for each localizable XAML file.
member.returns: The generated localization file for each localizable XAML file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.HostInBrowser
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the generated assembly is a XAML browser application (XBAP).
member.returns: true if the generated assembly is a XAML browser application (XBAP); otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.IsRunningInVisualStudio
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the task is running in Visual Studio.
member.returns: true if the task is running in Visual Studio; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.KnownReferencePaths
member.summary: Gets or sets the paths of referenced assemblies that do not change during the build procedure.
member.returns: The paths of referenced assemblies that do not change during the build procedure.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the managed language that the compiler supports.
member.returns: The managed language that the compiler supports. The valid values are C#, VB, and C++.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.LanguageSourceExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the extension that is appended to the extension of the generated managed code file.
member.returns: The extension that is appended to the extension of the generated managed code file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.LocalizationDirectivesToLocFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies how to generate localization information for each Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) file.
member.returns: A value that specifies how to generate localization information for each Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) file. The valid values are None, CommentsOnly, and All.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.OutputPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of generated code files.
member.returns: The location of generated code files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.OutputType
member.summary: Gets or sets the output type of the assembly.
member.returns: The type of assembly that is generated by a project. The valid values are winexe, exe, library, and netmodule.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.PageMarkup
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of XAML files to process.
member.returns: A list of XAML files to process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.References
member.summary: Gets or sets the assembly references.
member.returns: The assembly references.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.RequirePass2ForMainAssembly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the project contains non-localizable XAML files that reference local types that are embedded into the main assembly.
member.returns: true if project contains non-localizable XAML files that reference local types that are embedded into the main assembly.; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.RequirePass2ForSatelliteAssembly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the project contains localizable XAML files that reference local types that are embedded in the satellite assembly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.RootNamespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the root namespace of the classes inside the project.
member.returns: The root namespace of the classes inside the project.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.SourceCodeFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the source code file list for the current project.
member.returns: The source code file list for the current project.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MarkupCompilePass1.SplashScreen

member.returns: The splash screen image.
